critique: The document is a proclamation regarding the boundaries of the Zuni National Forest in Arizona and New Mexico. It discusses the exclusion of certain parts of the Zuni and Navajo Indian Reservations from the forest and the restoration of these lands to their previous status.The language is formal and legalistic, with specific references to acts of Congress, proclamations, and executive orders. There is no explicit expression of emotion in the document.The document aims to inform the public about the changes in the boundaries of the Zuni National Forest and the restoration of certain lands to the Zuni and Navajo Indian Reservations. It is a factual and administrative document, not intended to evoke any particular emotion. Therefore, all emotion scores should be low.
